title: How to improve my jungling
body: So, ive realized that i spend a bit too much time topside of the map when i jungle, especially because most game i counter jungle early, but it always seems that when i do bot lane feeds. no because of the jungler generally but because of their lane. now, how do i approach that? do i just keep getting my other two lanes fed and counter ****jungle at the expense of my bot lane, or try and do something about a bot lane that has 4+ kills in 5 mins. ty.

replies.body:
Apparently its "Meta" for all junglers to start on blue.

There is nothing much you can do to stop bot from feeding.
here are some things you can do.

- Never gank a losing lane. Leave em, focus on top and mid instead (Or lanes that ain't feeding)

- Try and get other lanes fed, in most cases for you. This should be mid.

-Only counter jungle if you have nothing better to do.

-If you have just ganked mid or top and gotten a kill, Push that very hard.

-Trade objectives. They get bot? You get top. 
They get dragon? You get rift.

-Focus on towers, first blood gold is alot and is very nice to have for a spike.

-BONUS: the moment you see ANYONE from mid or top bitch about you killing them (the enemy)
camp the FUCK out of that lane.
Don't Gank any lane <3 Just farm and focus your game, and just aim for Ks and be strong and carry game
